title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 38.0 - Finding of fact
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 38.0 - Finding of fact

State Regulations

The commissioner finds that every industry, trade, occupation and process involving the use or presence of radioactive material or
radiation-producing equipment involves elements of danger to the lives, health
and safety of persons employed or present therein. The commissioner further
finds that special regulations are necessary for the protection of such
persons, in that such material and equipment may emit invisible and
imperceptible rays or particles having the property of producing deleterious or
fatal effects, immediate or deferred, upon and within the human
body. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
38.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
